p: There was a marked variation in the estimated rate of seroconversion in cattle over time, with the rate being lower during the second year of the study ( Table 3). Seroconversion rate increased from October 2016 to peak at just over 1.5 per animal-year between February and April 2017, dropping to almost zero during August-September 2017 and then showing a lower peak of just over 0.5 per animal-year during December-January 2018 ( Fig 5).
